SELECT A.SERVICENO , A.SERVICENAME , A.SERVICEDESC , A.SERVICECODE , A.SERVICECHANNEL , A.SERVICETYPE , A.SERVICEOWNER , A.SERVICESTEP , A.FILESEARCHKEY , A.OWNER , (SELECT CODENAME FROM Crud_SaaS.dbo.T_CODE WHERE CODEGRP = 'SERVICECODE' AND SITEID = #{siteid} AND CODEVAL = A.SERVICECODE) AS SERVICECODE_ , (SELECT CODENAME FROM Crud_SaaS.dbo.T_CODE WHERE CODEGRP = 'SERVICECHANNEL' AND SITEID = #{siteid} AND CODEVAL = A.SERVICECHANNEL) AS SERVICECHANNEL_ , (SELECT CODENAME FROM Crud_SaaS.dbo.T_CODE WHERE CODEGRP = 'SERVICETYPE' AND SITEID = 1 AND CODEVAL = A.SERVICETYPE) AS SERVICETYPE_ , CONVERT(nvarchar,A.RECEPTIONDATE, 23) AS RECEPTIONDATE_ , (SELECT USERNAME FROM Crud_SaaS.dbo.TB980010 WHERE USERNO = A.SERVICEOWNER) AS SERVICEOWNER_ , (SELECT USERNAME FROM Crud_SaaS.dbo.TB980010 WHERE USERNO = A.OWNER) AS OWNER_ , (SELECT CODENAME FROM Crud_SaaS.dbo.T_CODE WHERE CODEGRP = 'SERVICESTEP' AND SITEID = #{siteid} AND CODEVAL = A.SERVICESTEP) AS SERVICESTEP_ , B.CUSTNAME, B.EMAIL, B.DUTY , B.HOMADDR1 + B.HOMADDR2 + B.HOMADDR3 AS CUSTADDRESS , B.MOBILE1 + '-' + B.MOBILE2 + '-' + B.MOBILE3 AS MOBILE , C.BSNO, C.CORP_SN AS INCNO , C.MOBILE1 + '-' + C.MOBILE2 + '-' + C.MOBILE3 AS CLIMOBILE , C.PRSDNAME, C.HOMEPAGE, C.CLINO, C.CLINAME
FROM Crud_SaaS.dbo.T_SERVICE A LEFT OUTER JOIN Crud_SaaS.dbo.CU100010 B ON B.CUSTNO = A.CUSTNO LEFT OUTER JOIN Crud_SaaS.dbo.TB200010 C ON C.CLINO = A.CLINO WHERE A.SITEID = #{siteid} AND A.SERVICENO = #{serviceno}

SELECT CONVERT(nvarchar,A.VISITDATE,23) AS VISITDATE_ ,A.VISITTIME ,(SELECT CODENAME FROM Crud_SaaS.dbo.T_CODE WHERE CODEGRP = 'REWARDTYPE' AND SITEID = #{siteid} AND CODEVAL = A.REWARDTYPE) AS REWARDTYPE_ ,(SELECT CODENAME FROM Crud_SaaS.dbo.T_CODE WHERE CODEGRP = 'CAUSECODE' AND SITEID = #{siteid} AND CODEVAL = A.CAUSECODE) AS CAUSECODE_ ,(SELECT CODENAME FROM Crud_SaaS.dbo.T_CODE WHERE CODEGRP = 'DELAYTYPE' AND SITEID = #{siteid} AND CODEVAL = A.DELAYTYPE) AS DELAYTYPE_ ,A.REWARDDESC ,A.DELAYDESC ,A.FILESEARCHKEY FROM Crud_SaaS.dbo.T_REWARD A WHERE A.SITEID = #{siteid} AND A.SERVICENO = #{serviceno}

SELECT CONVERT(nvarchar,A.RACTDATE,23) AS RACTDATE_ , (SELECT CODENAME FROM Crud_SaaS.dbo.T_CODE WHERE CODEGRP = 'SENDYN' AND SITEID = #{siteid} AND CODEVAL = A.SENDYN) AS SENDYN_ , A.RACTDESC , A.FILESEARCHKEY FROM Crud_SaaS.dbo.T_RACT A WHERE A.RACTNO IN (SELECT MAX(RACTNO) AS RACTNO FROM Crud_SaaS.dbo.T_RACT GROUP BY SERVICENO ) AND A.SERVICENO = #{serviceno} AND A.SITEID = #{siteid}

SELECT TOP 5 CONVERT(nvarchar,A.RACTDATE,23) AS RACTDATE_ , (SELECT USERNAME FROM Crud_SaaS.dbo.TB980010 WHERE USERNO = (SELECT OWNER FROM Crud_SaaS.dbo.T_SERVICE WHERE SERVICENO = A.SERVICENO)) AS OWNER_ , CASE WHEN A.RACTCODE = 1 THEN 'option1' WHEN A.RACTCODE = 2 THEN 'option2' WHEN A.RACTCODE = 3 THEN 'option3' END AS RACTCODE_ , CASE WHEN A.SENDYN = 0 THEN '미발송' WHEN A.SENDYN = 1 THEN '발송' END AS SENDYN_ ,A.RACTDESC FROM Crud_SaaS.dbo.T_RACT A WHERE A.SITEID = #{siteid} AND A.SERVICENO = #{serviceno}

SELECT A.CONVEYNO ,A.SERVICENO ,A.PREVOWNER ,(SELECT USERNAME FROM Crud_SaaS.dbo.TB980010 WHERE A.PREVOWNER = USERNO) AS PREVOWNER_ ,A.NEXTOWNER ,(SELECT USERNAME FROM Crud_SaaS.dbo.TB980010 WHERE A.NEXTOWNER = USERNO) AS NEXTOWNER_ ,(SELECT CODENAME FROM Crud_SaaS.dbo.T_CODE WHERE CODEGRP = 'CONVEYREASON' AND SITEID = #{siteid} AND CODEVAL = A.CONVEYREASON) AS CONVEYREASON_ ,CONVERT(nvarchar,A.CONVEYDATE,23) AS CONVEYDATE ,A.CONVEYDESC FROM Crud_SaaS.dbo.T_CONVEY A WHERE A.SERVICENO = #{serviceno} AND A.SITEID = #{siteid}

SELECT A.SERVICENO AS id , CASE WHEN A.SERVICESTEP = 2 THEN '[현상파악]' + A.SERVICENAME WHEN A.SERVICESTEP = 3 THEN '[이관]' + A.SERVICENAME WHEN A.SERVICESTEP = 4 THEN '[처리]' + A.SERVICENAME WHEN A.SERVICESTEP = 5 THEN '[종료]' + A.SERVICENAME END AS title
, CASE WHEN A.SERVICESTEP = 2 THEN CONVERT(nvarchar,B.VISITDATE,23) WHEN A.SERVICESTEP = 3 THEN CONVERT(nvarchar,D.CONVEYDATE,23) WHEN A.SERVICESTEP = 4 THEN CONVERT(nvarchar,C.RACTDATE,23) WHEN A.SERVICESTEP = 5 THEN CONVERT(nvarchar,A.EDTDATE,23) END 'start'
, CASE WHEN A.SERVICESTEP = 2 THEN '#FF33CC' WHEN A.SERVICESTEP = 3 THEN '#CC33FF' WHEN A.SERVICESTEP = 4 THEN '#9933FF' WHEN A.SERVICESTEP = 5 THEN '#333333' END AS color , CASE WHEN A.SERVICESTEP = 2 THEN B.REWARDDESC WHEN A.SERVICESTEP = 3 THEN D.CONVEYDESC WHEN A.SERVICESTEP = 4 THEN C.RACTDESC WHEN A.SERVICESTEP = 5 THEN A.SERVICEDESC END AS 'desc' ,(SELECT USERNAME FROM Crud_SaaS.dbo.TB980010 WHERE USERNO = A.SERVICEOWNER) AS SERVICEOWNER_ ,(SELECT USERNAME FROM Crud_SaaS.dbo.TB980010 WHERE USERNO = A.OWNER) AS OWNER_ FROM Crud_SaaS.dbo.T_SERVICE A LEFT OUTER JOIN Crud_SaaS.dbo.T_REWARD B ON B.SERVICENO = A.SERVICENO LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM Crud_SaaS.dbo.T_RACT WHERE RACTNO IN (SELECT max(ractno) AS ractno FROM Crud_SaaS.dbo.T_RACT group by serviceno )) C ON C.SERVICENO = A.SERVICENO LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM Crud_SaaS.dbo.T_CONVEY WHERE CONVEYNO IN (SELECT max(conveyno) AS conveyno FROM Crud_SaaS.dbo.T_CONVEY group by serviceno )) D ON D.SERVICENO = A.SERVICENO WHERE A.SITEID = #{siteid} AND A.SERVICESTEP != 1
